statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -5 \\ -1 \\ 9 \\ 11 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ 7 \\ 7 \\ -7 \\ -17 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
